front.title: Hierachical PCE Extensions for Inter-Domain Point-to-Multipoint Path Computation

abstract.t: The hierachical Path Computation Element (PCE) architecture defined in [PCE-HIERARCHY-FWK] allows the optimum sequence of domains to be selected, and the optimum end-to-end path to be derived through the use of a hierarchical relationship between domains. This document defines the hierachical PCE (H-PCE) extensions for the purpose of implementing inter-domain P2MP Path Computation.
